description: This file defines API routes for managing user groups in a backend application. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, joining, and leaving groups, utilizing FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM for database interactions.

methods.name: Group _get_group(db: Session, group_id)
methods.description: Fetches a group from the database by ID, raising 404 if not found.

methods.name: list[GroupResponse] list_groups(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Lists all groups the current user belongs to.

methods.name: GroupResponse create_group( payload: GroupCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates a new group with the current user as owner.

methods.name: GroupResponse get_group(group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves a specific group by ID if the user is a member.

methods.name: None join_group(group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Allows a user to join a public group.

methods.name: None leave_group(group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Allows a user to leave a group.

ctags.name: create_group
ctags.signature: ( payload: GroupCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: get_group
ctags.pattern: /^def get_group(group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user)/
ctags.signature: (group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.name: join_group
ctags.pattern: /^def join_group(group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user/
ctags.signature: (group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.name: leave_group
ctags.pattern: /^def leave_group(group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_use/
ctags.signature: (group_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.name: list_groups
ctags.pattern: /^def list_groups(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user)) -> lis/
